title: [GAMEPLAY] Snowday Bard Dance (Control + 3)
body: Snowday Bard is bugged because of his dance (Control + 3). If you press Control + 3 Snowday Bard make some moves and starts dancing without his music. He moves to the left, to the right and after his second move to the left the music starts to play. It's just the Snowday Bard Skin. The dance by the other skin (Elderwood Bard) works normal as the vanilla skin.

replies.body:
Hey GodeStyler -

Thanks for the report! It looks like this is a known issue, but not something that is being prioritized at this time. That said, it's something we would like to resolve!
